prompts: Create an insect-type Pokemon with vibrant orange and purple patterns.
I want a spider-like Pokemon that features striking yellow accents.
Generate a bug-type creature that is small and has unique body shapes.
Show me a Pokemon with a mix of forest colors and a distinctive web design.
Imagine a Pokemon that captures the essence of a jungle with its vivid colors.
Make a bug Pokemon that has both agility and a colorful appearance.
Design an arachnid-inspired Pokemon that thrives in urban environments.
